name: Device Type
description: Categorizes devices as Mobile, Tablet, or Desktop.

name: Operating System
description: Categorizes platform as MacOS, Android, Windows, or iOS.

name: Query Parameters
description: Checks for a query parameter in a web page's URL.

name: Referrer
description: Checks the URI of the web page that linked to the current page.

name: Country
description: Allows targeting users based on the country they are visiting from.

name: Region
description: Allows targeting users based on the region or state they are visiting from.

name: City
description: Allows targeting users based on the city they are visiting from.

name: Date And Time
description: Helps defining audiences for a specific time range.
